title: Infant mortality rate in Yemen 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Deaths per 1,000 live births, containing a total of 11 data points.
Overall Deaths per 1,000 live births has decreased over the Year.
Deaths per 1,000 live births is slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2011, and finally roughly constant from 2011 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Deaths per 1,000 live births, about 47.0 was reported at Year 2008
The lowest Deaths per 1,000 live births, of value 42.9 was reported at Year 2012,  2013,  2014,  2015,  2016,  2017, and 2018
